title: Las Bebidas
subtitle: Drinks
meta_desc: Learn drink vocabulary in Spanish with audio pronunciation. Ages 2-5.
keywords: learn Spanish preschool, Spanish food book, drinks Spanish, bilingual children books

pages.title: Las Bebidas
pages.prompt: A colorful array of different drinks on a table - juice, milk, water, smoothie, professional food photography, landscape orientation, wide 16:9 format, high resolution.

pages.title: El agua es clara.

pages.title: El jugo es de manzana.

pages.title: La leche es nutritiva.

pages.title: El batido es rosa.

pages.title: El chocolate es caliente.
